New Records: Anthony Edwards becomes only the second player after Stephen Curry to sink 50 threes in the first nine games of the season.
Key Match Events: Anthony Edwards led the Minnesota Timberwolves to a resounding victory over the Portland Trail Blazers, scoring a game-high 37 points.
Edwards' exceptional three-point shooting, including nine threes, proved too much for the Blazers' defensive strategy.
The Minnesota Timberwolves won with a 127-102 score over Portland Trail Blazers.
Post-Match Reflections: Anthony Edwards addressed concerns about taking too many threes per game, expressing confidence in his shot selection.
Edwards expressed surprise at the defensive strategy of the Blazers, who allowed him to shoot over a dozen three-point attempts.
